Reviews.Title: Sony alpha
Reviews.Author: LJ
Reviews.Content: The best camera I've ever owned.  The pictures are sharp with the speed in action.  It takes pictures so fast in sequence that you have to learn to lay off the button.  Video on this camera is also very good and the microphone picks up volume well.  It is pricey, but well worth the investment if you enjoy taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Sony Alpha SLT-A77 Camera 2 Lens KIt
Reviews.Author: jo42
Reviews.Content: I received all items mentioned and every thing of important seem to work great. I do wonder why a small tripod (that does not work)was included when is to small for the camera.
